FolderedContentDocument.name: FolderedContentDocument
FolderedContentDocument.description: Represents the relationship between a parent and child ContentFolderItem in a ContentWorkspace.

ContentDocumentId.description: ID of the ContentDocument that can be in a folder.

IsFolder.description: Indicates that the FolderedContentDocument is a folder, rather than a file.

ParentContentFolderId.description: ID of the ContentFoldr the ContentDocument resides in.

Title.description: Name of the file or folder in a ContentFolder.
